people_also_ask.question: Is Majora's Mask the darkest Zelda game?
people_also_ask.heading: Majora's Mask is easily the darkest Zelda game ever, and nothing is quite as dark as seeing the Deku Butler weep beside the lifeless body of his son. ... Throughout the game, we learn that the masks Link wears all hold the souls of various residents of Termina, and we actually meet the spirits, except the Deku.11-Jul-2019
people_also_ask.title: 10 Times The Legend Of Zelda Series Got Far Too Dark

people_also_ask.question: Is Majoras Mask hard?
people_also_ask.heading: Majora's Mask really is not that hard of a game. You have to play it in segments. You beat a dungeon, get some masks, do some sidequests to fill up your Notebook, then play Song of Time and go onto the next dungeon.06-Oct-2011
people_also_ask.title: How Hard is Majora's Mask??? | ZD Forums - Zelda Dungeon

people_also_ask.question: How long is Legend of Zelda Majora's Mask?
people_also_ask.heading: about 20½ Hours
people_also_ask.heading2: When focusing on the main objectives, The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask is about 20½ Hours in length. If you're a gamer that strives to see all aspects of the game, you are likely to spend around 31 Hours to obtain 100% completion.When focusing on the main objectives, The Legend of ZeldaThe Legend of ZeldaZelda is a nickname for the feminine name Griselda, which may originally have meant "dark battle" or "strong woman;" often combined to mean "Grey fighting maiden." It is also the feminine form of the Yiddish name Selig, meaning "blessed", "happy".https://en.wikipedia.org › wiki › Zelda_(given_name)Zelda (given name) - Wikipedia: Majora's Mask is about 20½ Hours in length. If you're a gamer that strives to see all aspects of the game, you are likely to spend around 31 Hours to obtain 100% completion.
people_also_ask.title: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask - HowLongToBeat.com

people_also_ask.question: Is Princess Zelda in Majora's Mask?
people_also_ask.heading: Majora's Mask is one of the few Zelda games in which Ganon does not play any role whatsoever. In addition, Princess Zelda does not play a major role; she is only seen once in a flashback scene from Ocarina of Time.
